Franco A. Alvarado

fixes things in pixels and ink

About Me

I like to fix things: sentences, pages, and books. I like to make your content look good, whether it is a website, an ebook, or a print book--or all three! I have made publishing my career, both digital and print, and I want to help you.

I’ve worn a lot of different hats. Currently my hat is Senior Technical Production Specialist at F+W Media where I focus on building templates, working on ebook quality assurance, and managing CMS publishing workflows for HTML, XML, ebook, and, of course, print.

Feel free to explore my site or get in touch with me.
